entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who killed Albus Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a young wizard who is opposing Voldemort.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who was killed by Voldemort.

relationships.description: Voldemort is opposing Harry in a battle of wits and magic.
Voldemort killed Albus Dumbledore, as revealed by Harry.
Harry and Albus Dumbledore were allies in their fight against Voldemort.
Voldemort has seen the body of Albus Dumbledore, which is decaying in a tomb.
